sections.description: StellaTech drives off-the-plan sales through immersive shared 3D experiences that connect customers to your project, it’s sales team and their channel partners seamlessly.
sections.title: redefining sales

sections.description: StellaTech Guarantees your project will impress with the best quality assets and experience not  possible before online — from 8k resolution videos to ultra high-fidelity renders and interactive walkthroughs, your sales team can curate customers experience alone or via our Real Tour meetings at the highest quality on the market.

sections.title: stock management
sections.description: Monitor and manage your stock and visualisations.  Create, share and allocate available stock. Update prices instantly for all users.  See the performance of your stock and sales live

sections.title: Real Tour
sections.description: surprise, delight and close more customers with StellaTech’s Real Tour and Real Sales Shared meeting experience. Our technology allows agents to showcase your development and its videos, renders and 3D walkthroughs in full resolution for your users without the compromise and limitations of Zoom or Microsoft Meetings.

cards.title: real sales
cards.description: StellaTech goes beyond high resolution immersive experiences.  Our Real Sales technology allows your Agents to track live progress of contracts, and help your customers complete the sale live in our Real Tour experience from updating their contract details to uploading the right documents in real time.

cards.title: collect deposits
cards.description: Don’t wait on bank deposits to close the deal, with our in-app payment gateway your customers can secure their dream apartment, home or investment right there and then.

caption.title: Review & sign your EoI
caption.description: Your Expression of Interest is now complete, please take your time to review and sign it.

cards.title: Complete Contracts
cards.description: One platform from prospect to pre-construction contract, with StellaTech your prospects become clients in one single location — no more emails, sharing links and messy miscommunication.

sections.title: global portfolio
sections.description: StellaTech was born from a true global need, where the physical borders were holding back the dreams of customers in search for their place to call home, in need to find a off the plan property anywhere in the world. We are here to break down the walls and connect people with places, allowing you and your agents to close deals fast and securely.

step1.title: make your project real
step1.description:
Whether your in the pre-planning stages or your project is ready to start selling off-plan, start a conversation around bringing your unbuilt project to life.

Let’s start with your project name

step2.title: Your project status
step2.description: We'd love to know where your project stands! Please share the current stage of your development with us.
options: We have renders, but want something more

step3.title: Understanding the project
step3.description: Please provide the number of lots and/or apartments included in your development project.

step4.title: Let’s get started
step4.description: Please provide your best contact details for us to reach you on to discuss bringing your project to life with StellaTech.

success.title: We are ready to go
success.description: We will get in touch within 24 business hours to better understand your project and how StellaTech accelerates sales.

sections.title:
Interested in partnering?
explore the partnership pathway
sections.description:
We are offering our product to exclusive partners to showcase the best 3D architectural providers, sales agents and their networks on StellaTech.

If you would like to explore becoming a premium partner or learnmore about StellaTech and how we have revolutionised sales and customer experience for the property industry, get in touch.
sections.successDescription: Thanks for your request, one of our team members will get in touch within 24 business hours.
